meanings.sent1: The teacher misclassified the student's test results.
meanings.sent2: The librarian accidentally misclassified the new books.
meanings.sent3: The robot misclassified the bananas as apples, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: Her actions were misclassified as rebellious when they were actually just misunderstood.
meanings.sent5: The detective's hunch proved correct when he realized the evidence had been misclassified.

meanings.sent1: The misclassified documents were causing delays in the project.
meanings.sent2: The misclassified items were moved to the correct section of the store.
meanings.sent3: The misclassified cat thought it was a dog and tried to bark.
meanings.sent4: The misclassified puzzle piece stood out among the others, creating a mismatch.
meanings.sent5: The misclassified plant was mistakenly labeled as poisonous, causing unnecessary fear.
